dublin_core.dcvalue: Kentaro Toyama published a forum in Boston Review titled Can Technology End Poverty He posits Many development experts promote information and communication technology ICT as a way to relieve global poverty They should pay more attention to the human beings who use it Technology no matter how well designed is only a magnifier of human intent and capacity It is not a substitute

Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-10T08:46:54Z (GMT).
